item.title: Report E-2024070553
item.description:
Report E-2024070553

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-25T15:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-16
  • City: MILTON
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 16, 2024, one (1) 5-gallon pail of UN2922 was punctured by a skid and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the loading dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from E3 Environmental (E3) to remediate the impacted site. E3 personnel utilized hand tools, absorbents, and a neutralizing agent to remediate the UN2922-impacted loading dock floor. All impacted material was collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum and staged on site.

item.title: Report E-2024070555
item.description:
Report E-2024070555

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-25T15:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-16
  • City: LAKELAND
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 16, 2024, one (1) 380-pound battery was damaged by a forklift and released approximately one (1) gallon of battery acid to the loading dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. HES personnel utilized hand tools, absorbents, and a neutralizing agent to remediate the battery acid-impacted loading dock floor. All impacted material was collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum and staged on site. The damaged battery was wrapped in plastic sheeting and also staged on site
